entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
